answers.answer: I've had 3 babies so far and one on the way. My diabetes has been an issue with all of them.My first weighed 9lbs 8ozs, my 2nd was 11lbs,and my third was the smallest,7lbs 6ozs. All by c-section. But I've never been induced due to babies weight.

My first was induced due to her size and polyhydramnios. My induction ended in a c-sectionand she was 9lbs. My second and third were both scheduled c-sections and both came before the scheduled date weighing 9 1/2 & 10 lbs.

question: I have an ultrasound on Wednesday to check on my littles weight because I'm a diabetic. Has anyone else been induced because of this and how much did ur babe weigh?
title: inducing according to weight
